name: Recommendme
0:
”Alexa, open Recommend Me.”
”Alexa, ask recommend me for t. v. series similar to Young Sheldon.”
”Alexa, ask recommend me for movies similar to Wonder Woman.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recommend me
des:
Looking for a new movies or t.v. shows to watch, just like the last one?

Here is Recommend Me, which will ease your pains of searching through internet for a films or a t.v. series similar to the one you like or always suggest to your friends.

To get started simply ask : 

"Alexa, open Recommend Me"

Or if you are adventurous enough to say complex sentences to get a movie or t.v. show recommendations say :

"Alexa, ask recommend me for movie like [the movie name]..."

"Alexa, ask recommend me for series like [the t.v. show name]..."

Recommend Me can give you top movies and sitcom suggestions for all categories from animation to sci-fi.

Explore new movies to watch and series to binge watch on, also don't forget to have fun and share with your friends to help them out when they can't find a good movie to watch.

New feature and updates are incoming for this skill, hold on for a long ride!

Please, let me know if you have any suggestions or bugs, you can find my socials here http://adityashin.de/

Requires: Amazon echo, echo dot, or any Alexa enabled device.
Credits: TMDb API
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
